text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Who cares. They are doing very well. What is the inafatuation with testing. Wasting everyone’s time to please you twat journalists. If you feel ill, stay at home for 7 days and if you have others stay in for 14 days. If your really ill call 999.
